Global.title: Cross Hotbar (XHB) Layout Keymapping and Keybinding Tool for Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail – XIVBARS
Global.description: Create hotbar layouts and and controller keybindings for FFXIV: Dawntrail. Optimize your Job action rotations and cooldowns for keyboard and mouse or game controllers or explore player-created layouts and guides. Export your configurations to macros for  direct import into the game and share your setups with others.

CopyLayout.copy_layout: Create a new layout and with all slotted actions and configurations

ToggleSaveForm.signin: Sign in with Discord, save your layouts
ToggleSaveForm.too_many_layouts: You’ve reached your maximum alotted layouts. Delete others to publish new ones.

DetailPanel.draft: This **Layout** is saved as a draft. Add a description by editing this Layout to make this publicly available.

EorzeaProfile.title: FFXIV Profile Twitch Streamer Panel
EorzeaProfile.body: Display your Final Fantasy XIV Endwalker character profile on your stream page.

generic.title: Uh oh! Something went wrong...
generic.body: We seem to have hit a fail state. The error has been logged but unfortunately you’ll need to start over.

ExportToMacro.limitations: A limited set of actions can assigned via macro commands. Incompatible actions are ommited from the generated macro. Also note that Macros are limited to 15 lines each.

Footer.submit_an_issue: Request a feature or, submit a bug report
Footer.property_of_squenix: All Final Fantasy XIV content is property of Square Enix Co., LTD

Hero.heading: A Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail Cross Hotbar (XHB) Layout Tool and Controller Keybinding Setup Guides
Hero.body: This app lets you simulate and Plan your Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail Hotbars (HB) and Cross Hotbars (XHB). Create your own layouts and keybindings to optimize your Job action rotations and cooldowns or explore player-created setups and guides. Take advantage of drag-and-drop functionality  for easy keybindings and personalizations for use with keyboard and  mouse or game controllers and export your keybindings to macros for  direct import into the game and share your setups with others.

HowTo.body: Creating the perfect hotbar interface setup in Final Fantasy XIV Endwalker using a controller is clunky and time-consuming. This simulator allows you to plan out your hotbar layouts using a web-based drag-and-drop interface to simulate different configurations before commiting it to your controller HUD in-game.
HowTo.plan_your_hotbars: Choose from and plan your hotbars for any of the FFXIV Jobs
HowTo.simulate_hotbars: Simulate either a Cross Hotbar (XHB) or standard Hotbars layout.
HowTo.drag_and_drop: Drag and Drop Actions to Slots
HowTo.slot_actions: Slot any of the Combat and Role actions for your selected Job, as well as any Menu Command, Macros, and other Actions.
HowTo.export_to_macro: Export to a Macro and Share With Others
HowTo.save_and_share: Once you’re done configuring your Final Fantasy XIV Endwalker hotbar layout, save or share your layout with the generated URL. You can also export your layout to a macro that you can use to import your layout into the game.

LayoutCard.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Layout?

User.title: {{userName}} - Hotbar Keybinding and Controller Layouts - FFXIV Dawntrail
User.description: Final Fantasy XIV hotbar and cross hotbar UI layouts by {{userName}}. Explore various configurations and setups for Final Fantasy XIV’s hotbar and cross hotbar user interfaces, optimizing your gameplay experience with different placement, size, and customization options.
User.no_layouts: No Layouts – create a new one!

Settings.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
Settings.are_you_really_sure: Your layouts, hearts, and other account associated information will be deleted. There’s no going back once you confirm.

Job.title: {{jobName}} Hotbar Layouts and Keybinding Setup Guides - FFXIV Dawntrail
Job.description: This page lists all player-created Hotbar (HB) and Cross Hotbar (XHB) layouts and keybinding setup guides for the {{jobName}} job in Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail.
Job.short_description: This is a {{jobName}} keybinding setup guide for your {{hotbarLayout}} actions for Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail.

Layout.title: {{jobName}} ({{jobAbbr}}) Hotbar Layout and Controller Keybinding Guide - FFXIV Dawntrail

NewLayout.title: Create a new {{jobName}} Hotbar Layout Guide - FFXIV Dawntrail
NewLayout.description: Plan your {{jobName}} Hotbars or Cross Hotbars (XHB) with this tool. Drag and drop, or click to assign actions to hotbar slots and save to a shareable URL.

NotFound.body: It doesn’t look like the page your looking for exists at this url.
NotFound.option1: Go back to the previous page and try again
NotFound.option2: Report an issue if you think this page should be here

ServerError.title: Yikes! Something went wrong
ServerError.body: The error has been logged and we’ll try to fix it as soon as possible.
ServerError.option1: Go back to the previous page and try again
ServerError.option2: Check on the status of this issue or report a bug
